metadata.title: CVE-2014-4658 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The vault subsystem in Ansible before 1.5.5 does not set the umask before creation or modification of a vault file, which allows local users to obtain sensitive key information by reading a file. It was discovered that Ansible did not properly set permissions upon creation or modification of a vault file. A local attacker could use this to obtain sensitive information.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2014-4658` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 1.6.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.5+dfsg-1').
